entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
